headline: Zoe Lofgren
abstract: In choosing Ms. Lofgren, Speaker Nancy Pelosi put a seasoned, even-tempered ally on the team that will prosecute the House’s case in the Senate.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — When it comes to impeachment, Representative Zoe Lofgren, Democrat of California, is arguably the institutional memory for Congress.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
